column4: Quetstion: Will my Microsoft keyboard and mouse work with Ubuntu (Running on USB)
Will my netgear wireless adapter work fine aswell?
Damn you guys are really helpful and fast
How much ram would it use just running the OS?
Do you have to have the CD in to use the OS?
Yeah I am downloading the ISO, burning it onto a CD then installing it
But I thought you said you need to have the 'live cd' in to use the OS
you on a win machine now?
unless they are logitec.. then some have issues..
that's why we get the big bucks :)
the live cd I think requires 384 to run.. server 256.. but the more the merrier..
but then how you gonna get it?  .. you could download the iso and put it on a usb stick instead of a cd

ok.. the live cd allow you to boot from it.  You'll be able to run the os right from the cd.. it's slower (much) but a good way to test it... also burning the iso is different from data. if your burning software doesn't support iso images. just google for windows iso burner.. when burning do it at the slowest speed possible..
there you go .. Dr_Willis had ubottu give you a link that might be helpful
